lead_paragraph: - Frenchman Antoine Griezmann joined regulars Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo on the shortlist for FIFA's Player of the Year award on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Ronaldo, Messi and Griezmann to Contest FIFA's Annual Award
headline.main: Ronaldo, Messi and Griezmann to Contest FIFA's Annual Award

snippet: - Frenchman Antoine Griezmann joined regulars Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo on the shortlist for FIFA's Player of the Year award on Friday....
